import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button } from '../Button/Button'; function Navbar() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const [button, setButton] = useState(true); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(false); const showButton = () => { if(window.innerWidth <= 960) { setButton(false); } else { setButton(true); } }; useEffect(() => { showButton() }, []); window.addEventListener('resize', showButton); return ( <>
  • Home
  • Blog
  • Music
  • Other
) } export default Navbar
